tuv.seg: Checklist when applying for Jobseeker's Allowance
Seicliosta nuair atá iarratas á dhéanamh ar Liúntas Cuardaitheora Poist
When you apply for Jobseeker’s Allowance you must bring certain documents with you
Nuair a dhéantar iarratas ar Liúntas Cuardaitheora Poist, caithfidh tú doiciméid áirithe a thabhairt leat
If you lose your job or are made redundant
Má chailltear post nó má dhéantar iomarcach tú
If you lose your job or are made redundant you should bring your P45 or a letter from your employer confirming the last day you worked
Má chailltear post nó má dhéantar iomarcach tú, ba chóir duit do P45 nó litir ón bhfostóir a thabhairt leat a dhearbhaíonn an lá deiridh a d'oibrigh tú
If you don’t have your P45 or a letter from your employer you should still apply
Mura bhfuil do P45 nó litir ón bhfostóir agat, ba chóir duit iarratas a dhéanamh mar sin féin
However, it is important to bring either your P45 or a letter from your employer as soon as possible to your Intreo Centre or local Social Welfare Branch Office
Mar sin féin, tá sé tábhachtach do P45 nó litir ó d'fhostóir a thabhairt chuig an Ionad Intreo ó Oifig Leasa Shóisialaigh Áitiúil chomh luath agus is féidir

If you have difficulty getting your P45 from your employer tell the member of staff dealing with your claim at your Intreo Centre or local Social Welfare Branch Office (see ‘If you don’t have your P45’ below)
Má tá deacracht agat ag fáil do P45 ón bhfostóir, inis do bhall foirne atá ag déileáil le d'éileamh san Oifig Leasa Shóisialaigh Áitiúil (féach ‘Mura bhfuil do P45 agat thíos)
If you are laid off
Má dhéantar tú a leagan as
If you are laid off temporarily, you may or may not get a P45
Má dhéantar tú a leagan as go sealadach, b'fhéidir go bhfaighfeá nó nach bhfaighfeá P45
If you don’t have a P45 you must bring a letter from your employer stating the following:
Mura bhfuil P45 agat, caithfidh tú litir ón bhfostóir a thabhairt a thugann na sonraí a leanas:
• You have been laid off work without pay
• Má dhéantar tú a leagan as gan phá
• The last day you worked
• An lá deiridh a d'oibrigh tú
• The reason for the lay off
• An chúis leis an leagan as
• How long he or she expects you will be laid off
• Cé chomh fada a shíleann sé/sí a mhairfidh do leagan as
If your days of work are reduced
Má dhéantar do laethanta oibre a laghdú
If your days of work are reduced you must bring a letter from your employer stating the following:
Má laghdaítear do laethanta oibre, caithfidh tú litir a thabhairt ón bhfostóir a thugann na sonraí a leanas:
• Your days at work have been reduced on a temporary basis
• Go bhfuil do laethanta oibre laghdaithe ar bhonn sealadach
• The number of days you worked each week
• An líon laethanta a d'oibrigh tú gach seachtain
• The number of days you now work each week
• An líon laethanta a oibríonn tú gach seachtain anois
• The reduction in your pay
• An laghdú pá atá agat
You also need to bring the following documents or information:
Caithfidh tú na doiciméid agus an t-eolas a leanas a thabhairt leat chomh maith:
• Your Public Services Card (if you don't have one you will be asked to register for one when applying for Jobseeker's Allowance)
• Do Cárta Seirbhísí Poiblí
• Your Personal Public Service number
• Do Uimhir Phearsanta Seirbhíse Poiblí
• Details of your availability for work and any efforts you have made to get work
• Sonraí faoi d'infhaighteacht le haghaidh fostaíochta agus na hiarrachtaí atá déanta agat chun obair a fháil
For example, letters you have written to employers and any responses you have received
Mar shampla, litreacha atá scríofa agat chuig fostóirí agus na freagraí a fuarthas
• Details of your spouse/partner's income (if any)
• Sonraí ioncaim do chéile nó páirtí (mar is cuí)
• Details of your dependent children
• Sonraí do leanaí cleithiúnacha
• Proof of your identity (see below for more information)
• Cruthúnas céannachta (féach thíos chun tuilleadh eolais a fháil)
• Proof of address (see below for more information)
• Cruthúnas seolta (féach thíos chun tuilleadh eolais a fháil)
You can provide evidence of your identity by showing your passport or your driver's licence
Mura bhfuil pas nó ceadúnas tiomána agat, ba chóir duit aon doiciméad eile atá agat a thabhairt isteach, go háirithe ceann a bhfuil grianghraf díot air
If you do not have either a passport or driver’s licence, you should bring any other document that you may have, particularly one that has your photograph on it
Is féidir do chéannacht a chruthú trí do phas nó ceadúnas tiomána a thaispeáint agus ceann ar bith de na nithe a leanas: • Aitheantas fótagrafach eile • Aoischárta • Cárta Leighis
The following documents may also be acceptable: credit card, debit card, medical card, age ID card, work ID card, club membership card
Caithfidh tú sloinne breithe do mháthar a sholáthar chomh maith
The following items are not accepted as proof of identity:
Níl na nithe a leanas inghlactha mar chruthúnas céannachta:
• Birth or Baptismal certificates
• Leagan gearr de theastas breithe
A claim cannot be decided until identity has been proven
Ní féidir cinneadh a dhéanamh faoi éileamh gan chruthúnas céannachta
You may be asked to show evidence of your address
D'fhéadfaí iarraidh ort fianaise ar do sheoladh a thaispeáint
You should bring any of the following documents:
Ba chóir duit ceann ar bith de na doiciméid seo a leanas a thabhairt isteach:
• Recent bills from utility companies such as electricity, telephone (landline or mobile), gas, cable television, waste charges etc
• Billí le déanaí ó chuideachtaí fóntais cosúil le leictreachas, teileafón (líne talún nó fón póca), gás, teilifís chábla, táillí dramhaíola srl
• Recent statements/letters from banks, building societies, credit unions, credit card companies or other financial institutions
• Ráitis/litreacha le déanaí ó bhainc, chumainn foirgníochta, chomhair chreidmheasa, chuideachtaí cárta creidmheasa nó institiúidí airgeadais eile
• Recent letters addressed to you from insurance companies, local authorities, government departments or the Revenue Commissioners
• Litreacha a seoladh chugat le déanaí ó chuideachtaí árachais, údaráis áitiúla, ranna rialtais nó na Coimisinéirí Ioncaim
• Local authority rent book, mortgage or leasing agreement
• Leabhar cíosa údaráis áitiúil, morgáiste nó comhaontú léasaithe
Note: a recent document is one issued within the last 2 months
Tabhair faoi deara: is é atá i gceist le doiciméad le déanaí ná ceann a eisíodh le 2 mhí anuas
All documents must be originals, not photocopies
Caithfidh na doiciméid go léir a bheith ina mbunchóipeanna, ní ghlacfar le fótachóipeanna
If there is doubt about your address, the Jobseeker's Allowance claim is not awarded for payment until your address is verified
Má tá amhras ar bith faoin seoladh, ní íoctar an t-éileamh ar Liúntas Cuardaitheora Poist go dtí go ndéantar do sheoladh a fhíorú
If you don’t have your P45
Mura bhfuil do P45 agat
If you don’t have your P45 you should still apply for your Jobseeker’s Allowance
Ba chóir duit iarratas a dhéanamh ar íocaíocht cuardaitheora poist - fiú mura bhfuil do P45 agat
If you lose your job and your employer does not issue you with a P45, it may be because you have not been registered for PRSI by your employer
Má chailleann tú do phost agus mura n-eisíonn d'fhostóir foirm P45 duit, d'fhéadfadh sé a bheith amhlaidh toisc nár chláraigh sé nó sí tú le haghaidh ÁSPC
It also could be that you have been registered but your employer has not paid the PRSI contributions which are due or has not paid the correct amount
D'fhéadfadh sé gur cláraíodh tú ach nár íoc d'fhostóir na ranníocaíochtaí ÁSPC a bhí iníoctha nó nár íocadh an méid ceart
Under the Social Welfare (Consolidation) Act 1993 the employer is obliged to register all employees for PRSI
Faoi réir An Acht Leasa Shóisialaigh (Comhdhlúthú), 1993 ní mór don fhostóir gach fostaí a chlárú chun críche ÁSPC
More information can be found about Paying social insurance
Is féidir tuilleadh eolais a fháil faoi Dhualgas an fhostóra chun árachas sóisialta a íoc
Jobseeker’s payment without a P45
Íocaíocht cuardaitheora poist gan P45
If your former employer refuses to give you a P45 you should still apply for Jobseeker’s Allowance
Má dhiúltaíonn d'iarfhostóir P45 a thabhairt duit, ba chóir duit iarratas a dhéanamh fós ar íocaíocht cuardaitheora poist
If you do not have a P45, the Department may informally contact your employer when you apply for Jobseeker’s Allowance and ask him or her to send you a P45 to help process your claim

Mura bhfuil P45 agat, is féidir leis an Roinn teagmháil neamhfhoirmiúil a dhéanamh le d'fhostóir nuair a dhéanann tú iarratas ar Shochar Cuardaitheora Poist nó Liúntas Cuardaitheora Poist agus iarraidh air nó uirthi P45 a sheoladh chugat chun d'éileamh a phróiseáil
If this hasn't resulted in your former employer giving you your P45, you can ask to fill in form IA49 at your Intreo Centre or Social Welfare Branch Office
Mura dtugann sé nó sí P45 duit dá thoradh sin féadfaidh tú a iarraidh san Oifig Leasa Shóisialaigh áitiúil go gcomhlíonfá foirm IA49
Form IA49 is a declaration stating that you believe your former employer did not comply with social insurance regulations
Is éard atá sa bhfoirm IA49 ná dearbhú go gcreideann tú nár chomhlíon d'iarfhostóir na rialacháin árachais shóisialta
As a result of your declaration, there will be an investigation into your employer's payment of PRSI
Déanfar fiosrú ar na híocaíochtaí ÁSPC a rinne d'iarfhostóir de thoradh do dhearbhaithe
Filling in form IA49 may not result in your P45, however, it may help to determine if you qualify for Jobseeker's Allowance
B'fhéidir nach bhfaighidh tú P45 de bharr IA49 a chomhlánú ach cabhróidh sé cinneadh a dhéanamh an bhfuil tú incháilithe don íocaíocht cuardaitheora poist
Other ways to get your P45
Bealaí eile chun do P45 a fháil
If you are not given a P45 when you leave your job you should first ask your employer for it
Mura dtugtar P45 duit nuair a fhágann tú do phost ba chóir duit a iarraidh ar d'fhostóir ar dtús í a thabhairt duit
If the employer does not supply it you should contact the tax office
Mura gcuireann sé nó sí ar fáil í ba chóir duit dul i dteagmháil leis an oifig cánach
If you contact your tax office, Revenue will contact the employer and obtain your P45 for you
Má théann tú i dteagmháil le d'oifig cánach, rachaidh na Coimisinéirí Ioncaim i dteagmháil le d'fhostóir agus gheobhaidh siad do P45 duit

If you have not been given your P45 and you think that your PRSI contributions have not been paid you should inform your local social welfare inspector by contacting your Intreo Centre or Social Welfare Branch Office or the Scope section of the Department of Social Protection

Murar tugadh P45 duit agus go bhfuil tú den tuairim ná íocadh do ranníocaíochtaí ÁSPC, ba chóir duit insint don chigire leasa shóisialaigh áitiúil trí theagmháil a dhéanamh le d'Ionad Intreo ó d'Oifig Leasa Shóisialaigh Áitiúil nó le rannóg Scóipe na Roinn Coimirce Sóisialaí
